items.title: Awesome Chatops
items.content_text:
### Articles

*   [Better Living Through ChatOps](https://medium.com/ibm-garage/better-living-through-chatops-df66872893e7) - The benefits ChatOps offers in managing a virtual war room.
*   [Making a Virtual War Room‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääthe Journey to ChatOps](https://medium.com/ibm-garage/making-a-virtual-war-room-the-journey-to-chatops-eaaecd83873c) - Creating a virtual war room, step by step.

items.title: Awesome Ddd
items.content_text:
### Blogs

*   [Ardalis.com](https://ardalis.com/blog) - Steve Smith. Pluralsight author and author of [DDD Fundamentals](https://www.pluralsight.com/courses/domain-driven-design-fundamentals) course and Microsoft [eShopOnWeb sample app (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/dotnet-architecture/eShopOnWeb).

### Sample Projects / .NET (C#/F#)

*   [eShopOnWeb (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/dotnet-architecture/eShopOnWeb) - Full ASP.NET Core 3.1 reference application from Microsoft showing monolithic deployment architecture
items.content_html:
Blogs

  • Ardalis.com - Steve Smith. Pluralsight author and author of DDD Fundamentals course and Microsoft eShopOnWeb sample app (‚≠ê10k).

Sample Projects / .NET (C#/F#)

items.title: Awesome Smart Tv
items.content_text:
### Misc / Official resources

*   [LIRC](http://lirc.org) - A package that allows you to decode and send infra-red signals of many (but not all) commonly used remote controls.
*   [awesome-smarttv (‚≠ê148)](https://github.com/linuxenko/awesome-smarttv) - Another list of Smart TV resources. Discovered after this one was already done :roll\_eyes:.
items.content_html:
Misc / Official resources

  • LIRC - A package that allows you to decode and send infra-red signals of many (but not all) commonly used remote controls.
  • awesome-smarttv (‚≠ê148) - Another list of Smart TV resources. Discovered after this one was already done üôÑ.

items.title: Awesome Wagtail
items.content_text:
### Apps / Forms

*   [Wagtail Simple Captcha (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/acarasimon96/wagtail-django-simple-captcha) - A self-hosted alternative to Wagtail ReCaptcha that easily integrates a [django-simple-captcha (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/mbi/django-simple-captcha) field into the Wagtail form builder.
items.content_html:
Apps / Forms

  • Wagtail Simple Captcha (‚≠ê3) - A self-hosted alternative to Wagtail ReCaptcha that easily integrates a django-simple-captcha (‚≠ê1.4k) field into the Wagtail form builder.
